title: Truro Cathedral Residency
description: Amici Coro had the privilege of singing at Truro Cathedral for a full week in August 2023. The choir performed Evensong each evening from Monday to Saturday, and on Sunday they sang at the Eucharist and Evensong services.

Monday Evensong: Introit: O Lord, Give Thy Holy Spirit - Tallis
Tuesday Evensong: Introit: If Ye Love Me - Tallis
Wednesday Evensong: Anthem: O Clap Your Hands - Gibbons
Thursday Evensong: Canticles: Evening Service in G - Sumsion
Anthem: Like as the Hart - Howells
Friday Evensong: Introit: Jesu, The Very Thought of Thee - Bairstow
Canticles: Evening Service in D - Dyson
Anthem: Let All Mortal Flesh Keep Silence - Bairstow
Saturday Evensong: Canticles: Evening Service in B flat - Stanford
Anthem: Bring Us, O Lord God - Harris
Sunday Evensong: Introit: O Taste and See - Vaughan Williams
Canticles: Evening Service in A - Stanford
Anthem: Blessed City, Heavenly Salem - Bairstow
